# Sentra Worldbook Generator

## MISSION
Generate ONE structured worldbook JSON for Sentra runtime injection.

## CRITICAL: OUTPUT ONLY ONE XML BLOCK
- Output ONLY ONE <sentra-worldbook> XML block.
- Do NOT output Markdown fences, explanations, or any other text.
- Do NOT use CDATA.
- Do NOT escape JSON (no < / > / &). Output raw JSON text.

## REQUIRED OUTPUT FORMAT (STRICT)
<sentra-worldbook>{JSON}</sentra-worldbook>

Where {JSON} is a single JSON object (not an array).

## JSON SCHEMA (RECOMMENDED)
The JSON MUST be an object and should include:
- meta: { title, version, description, language, tags }
- entries: array of entry objects

Entry schema (recommended):
- id: stable short id (snake_case)
- name: human readable
- keywords: string[] (trigger words/phrases)
- content: string (lore content)
- priority: number (higher wins)
- enabled: boolean
- tags: string[]

## QUALITY RULES
- entries should be actionable: each entry must contain enough information to answer questions.
- avoid contradictions; if unknown, keep generic and mark it as rumour/unknown.
- keep keywords practical (3-12 per entry).
- keep content information-dense; bullet-like paragraphs allowed.

## LANGUAGE
- Default zh-CN unless user requests otherwise.

## OUTPUT TEMPLATE
<sentra-worldbook>{
  "meta": { ... },
  "entries": [ ... ]
}</sentra-worldbook>

meta.name: worldbook_generator
meta.description: Generates a structured worldbook JSON wrapped in strict <sentra-worldbook>{JSON}</sentra-worldbook> XML (no CDATA).

messages.content:
世界观：近未来赛博朋克
语气：冷峻、硬核
核心设定：巨型企业统治、义体改造普及、黑客与地下组织对抗
需要包含：
- 城市概览
- 3 个巨企与业务
- 2 个地下组织
- 义体改造规则与风险
- 常用术语表
- 重要地点 5 个
输出：世界书 JSON

<sentra-worldbook>{
  "meta": {
    "title": "霓虹裂隙",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "近未来赛博朋克都市：巨企统治、义体改造、黑客与地下组织对抗",
    "language": "zh-CN",
    "tags": ["cyberpunk", "near_future"]
  },
  "entries": [
    {
      "id": "city_overview",
      "name": "城市概览",
      "keywords": ["城市", "霓虹", "塔区", "雾区"],
      "content": "- 城市被分为上层塔区与下层雾区
- 交通由磁悬轨与无人机廊道构成
- 法律更像企业合同：谁掌握权限，谁就拥有正义",
      "priority": 80,
      "enabled": true,
      "tags": ["overview"]
    }
  ]
}</sentra-worldbook>

世界观：古典奇幻（剑与魔法）
语气：史诗、庄严
需要包含：
- 魔法体系（来源/限制/代价）
- 王国 2 个、教会 1 个
- 3 个关键人物（简短背景 + 关系）
- 重要地名 6 个
- 专有名词表
输出：世界书 JSON

<sentra-worldbook>{
  "meta": {
    "title": "银烬纪",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "古典奇幻大陆：王国、教会与魔法代价交织的史诗时代",
    "language": "zh-CN",
    "tags": ["fantasy", "epic"]
  },
  "entries": [
    {
      "id": "magic_system",
      "name": "魔法体系：银烬与誓约",
      "keywords": ["银烬", "誓约", "法术", "代价"],
      "content": "来源：
- 魔法来自‘银烬’——古星陨落后的灰烬能量
限制：
- 施法者必须立下誓约（不可违背的规则）
代价：
- 违誓会导致‘灰化’：记忆与情感逐步剥落

常识：
- 强力法术必须借助媒介（符印/圣器/血契）
- 法术越具体、越强，誓约越苛刻",
      "priority": 95,
      "enabled": true,
      "tags": ["rules"]
    }
  ]
}</sentra-worldbook>

世界观：现代校园恋爱
语气：轻松、日常
需要包含：
- 学校概况
- 班级/社团 4 个
- 常见地点 8 个
- 校园传闻 6 条（可真假混合）
- 称呼/梗/规矩（例如‘学长/学姐’、‘社团活动日’）
输出：世界书 JSON

<sentra-worldbook>{
  "meta": {
    "title": "樱风学园",
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "description": "现代校园日常：社团活动、传闻与小小心动的发生地",
    "language": "zh-CN",
    "tags": ["campus", "slice_of_life"]
  },
  "entries": [
    {
      "id": "school_overview",
      "name": "学校概况",
      "keywords": ["樱风学园", "校规", "社团"],
      "content": "- 市立重点高中，校风宽松但成绩压力大
- 社团活动日为每周三，放学后校园更热闹
- 校规里最常被提起的是‘不得在走廊奔跑’",
      "priority": 80,
      "enabled": true,
      "tags": ["overview"]
    },
    {
      "id": "rumours",
      "name": "校园传闻（真假混合）",
      "keywords": ["传闻", "旧校舍", "天台", "樱花树"],
      "content": "1) 旧校舍音乐室半夜会响起钢琴声（可能是保安巡逻）
2) 天台门只有在下雨天才会自己打开（多半是风压）
3) 樱花树下写下名字，三天内会收到匿名情书（有人在恶作剧）

提示：传闻通常被学生用来试探对方胆量或制造独处机会",
      "priority": 70,
      "enabled": true,
      "tags": ["rumour"]
    }
  ]
}</sentra-worldbook>
